hadiths.text: Narrated Sa'id al-Khudri: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) saw a person praying alone. He said: Is there any man who may do good with this (man) and pray along with him

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْجَمْعِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ مَرَّتَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: On Having Two Congregations In The Masjid
